#summary The structure of the Data base
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

This describes all the tables used by this project, all of their columns, what data they hold, and their relations. Currently the name for the default database is SQUADRON_INFO. *Note:* In mysql this all must be handled by INNODB.


=Tables=
Here are all the tables used and a brief description of what they are used for.
||[#ACCOUNT_LOCKS ACCOUNT_LOCKS]||Is used to store information about a login being locked for a set time||
||[#ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT]||Holds all of the possible promotions and their associated rank||
||[#ATTENDANCE ATTENDANCE]||Holds who attended what events||
||[#AUDIT_DUMP AUDIT_DUMP]||Holds any variables that are relevant to an audit-able event||
||[#AUDIT_LOG AUDIT_LOG]||Holds the basic info for audit-able events such as an attempted security exploit, or a DB error||
||[#CAP_UNIT CAP_UNIT]||Holds all the CAP units that have signed into your squadron||
||[#CHAIN_OF_COMMAND CHAIN_OF_COMMAND]||Tells what staff position is under what other staff position _is position dependent *not* people dependent_||
||[#CONTACT_RELATIONS CONTACT_RELATIONS]||All the various relations an emergency contact can have with a member (i.e. Mother, Brother)||
||[#CPFT_REQUIREMENTS CPFT_REQUIREMENTS]||The Requirements for all of the CPFTs||
||[#CPFT_TEST_TYPES CPFT_TEST_TYPES]||The various tests for CPFT's (i.e. Shuttle Run)||
||[#DISCIPLINE_LOG DISCIPLINE_LOG]||Logs all discipline action given to Members||
||[#DISCIPLINE_OFFENSES DISCIPLINE_OFFFENSES]||The type of offense that disciplinary action was given for (i.e. Disrespectful behavior)||
||[#DISCIPLINE_TYPE DISCIPLINE_TYPE]||The type of Discipline Action given (i.e. verbal warning)||
||[#EMERGENCY_CONTACT EMERGENCY_CONTACT]||Holds emergency contact information for members||
||[#EVENTS EVENT]||Holds the Events that members sign into||
||[#EVENT_LOCATION EVENT_LOCATION]||The location the events are held at||
||[#EVENT_TYPES EVENT_TYPES]||The type of the event (i.e. meeting, volunteering)||
||[#FLIGHTS FLIGHTS]||Your flights in your squadron||
||[#GRADE GRADE]|| The various Ranks||
||[#INTRUSION_TYPE INTRUSION_TYPE]||The type of audit-able event for AUDIT_LOG||
||[#LOGIN_LOG LOGIN_LOG]||Logs all login attempts to prevent brute force attacks||
||[#MEMBER MEMBER]||Holds the information for the Actual Members (their names)||
||[#MEMBERSHIP_TYPES MEMBERSHIP_TYPES]||The types of membership (i.e. cadet, senior member, etc)||
||[#NEW_MEMBER NEW_MEMBER]||Sign-in for perspective members who don't have CAPIDS||
||[#NEXT_VISIT NEXT_VISIT]||Pages in /login that can be accessed based upon the page they were just on||
||[#PHASES PHASES]||The various phases for promotions (i.e. Phase I C/AB-C/ssgt)||
||[#PROMOTION_BOARD PROMOTION_BOARD]||Tracks all promotion boards given||
||[#PROMTION_RECORD PROMOTION_RECORD]||Holds the record of each promotion||
||[#PROMOTION_SIGN_UP PROMOTION_SIGN_UP]||Holds requests to promote||
||[#REGION REGION]||Holds all the CAP regions for use with the CAP Units||
||[#REQUIREMENTS_PASSED REQUIREMENTS_PASSED]||All the promotion requirements that have been passed (i.e. Passing the written Wright Brothers test)||
||REQUIREMENT_TYPE||The types of promotion requirements (i.e. CPFTs Drill Tests)||
||RIBBON||Holds all the ribbons you can be awarded||
||RIBBON_REQUEST||Holds all the requests for receiving a ribbon, *note* requests do not need to be approved, because only staff can enter the requests||
||SPECIAL_PERMISSION||Holds extra task permissions granted to staff, that is not included with their staff position||
||STAFF_PERMISSIONS||Task Permissions specific to that Staff Position (i.e. CDC's can edit member information)||
||STAFF_POSITIONS_HELD||Tells who has what job (i.e. who is the CDC)||
||SUBEVENT||Tells what sub-events happened at an event (i.e. having a Safety class at a meeting)||
||SUBEVENT_TYPE||The various sub-events||
||TASKS||The actual thing staff have permission to do, gives the URL||
||TASK_TYPE||The type of the task (i.e. member management)||
||TESTING_SIGN_UP||Sign up for taking tests||
||TEXT_SET||The various textbook sets (i.e. Leadership for the 21st Century or Learn to Lead||
||WING||All the CAP Wings for the Units||
